column5: My buddy and went on a three day trip and had a great time catching Pike so I thought I'd share.  This one was 42 inches and 17 Pounds caught trolling on a dollar store red devil lure!      The rest were caught mostly on minnows and a bobber:
The head on that fish is MASSIVE!! :|
Nice fish!  Looks like you have a siamese pike on the last picture
HAHA seen that TOO      Really nice fish anyways
Tough crowd man!  It was 16.7 steady but when I was taking the picture it was flopping around pretty good. That's my story and I'm sticking to it!  Peter
The bigger one could easily eat the smaller one for snack. Nice fish!
Nice fish there Pete looks like you guys had a good time
Some serious pike steaks there...nicely done!  Was it a fly-in?  Drive-in?
Just a drive to lake in Muskoka
Nice pike ya got there. Thanks for the report. It has been a great season so far for the toothy critters. I will be back at em tommorow.
no kidding, I would love to see her in the fall!  thanks for sharing!
